mapper.sql: id , name, gender, birthday, idCard, wedlock, nationId, nativePlace, politicsId, email, phone, address, departmentId, jobLevelId, positionId, engageForm, highestDegree, major, school, employmentDate, workStatus, workId, contractTerm, conversionDate, dimissionDate, beginContractDate, endContractDate, seniority, deleted
mapper.select:
select e.`id`, e.`name`, e.`gender`, e.`birthday`, e.`idCard`, e.`wedlock`, e.`nationId`, e.`nativePlace`, e.`politicsId`, e.`email`, e.`phone`, e.`address`, e.`departmentId`, e.`jobLevelId`, e.`positionId`, e.`engageForm`, e.`highestDegree`, e.`major`, e.`school`, e.`employmentDate`, e.`workStatus`, e.`workId`, e.`contractTerm`, e.`conversionDate`, e.`dimissionDate`, e.`beginContractDate`, e.`endContractDate`, e.`seniority`, e.`deleted`, n.`id` nId, n.`name` nName, p.`id` pId, p.`name` pName, d.`id` dId, d.`name` dName, j.`id` jId, j.`name` jName, pos.`id` posId, pos.`name` posName from employee e inner join nation n on e.`nationId` = n.`id` inner join politicsstatus p on e.`politicsId` = p.`id` inner join department d on e.`departmentId` = d.`id` inner join joblevel j on e.`jobLevelId` = j.`id` inner join position pos on e.`positionId` = pos.`id`
and e.`deleted` = false
and e.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into employee (id, name, gender, birthday, idCard, wedlock, nationId, nativePlace, politicsId, email, phone, address, departmentId, jobLevelId, positionId, engageForm, highestDegree, major, school, employmentDate, workStatus, workId, contractTerm, conversionDate, dimissionDate, beginContractDate, endContractDate, seniority, deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wedlock,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{engageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highestDegree,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employmentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{workStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{workId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{contractTerm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{conversionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dimissionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{beginContractDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endContractDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{seniority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update employee
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
idCard = #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR},
wedlock = #{wedlock,jdbcType=CHAR},
nationId = #{nationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nativePlace = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
politicsId = #{politicsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
departmentId = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jobLevelId = #{jobLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
positionId = #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
engageForm = #{engageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
highestDegree = #{highestDegree,jdbcType=CHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employmentDate = #{employmentDate,jdbcType=DATE},
workStatus = #{workStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
workId = #{workId,jdbcType=CHAR},
contractTerm = #{contractTerm,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
conversionDate = #{conversionDate,jdbcType=DATE},
dimissionDate = #{dimissionDate,jdbcType=DATE},
beginContractDate = #{beginContractDate,jdbcType=DATE},
endContractDate = #{endContractDate,jdbcType=DATE},
seniority = #{seniority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update employee set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, idCard = #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR}, wedlock = #{wedlock,jdbcType=CHAR}, nationId = #{nationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nativePlace = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, politicsId = #{politicsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, departmentId = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jobLevelId = #{jobLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, positionId = #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, engageForm = #{engageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, highestDegree = #{highestDegree,jdbcType=CHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employmentDate = #{employmentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, workStatus = #{workStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, workId = #{workId,jdbcType=CHAR}, contractTerm = #{contractTerm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, conversionDate = #{conversionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, dimissionDate = #{dimissionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, beginContractDate = #{beginContractDate,jdbcType=DATE}, endContractDate = #{endContractDate,jdbcType=DATE}, seniority = #{seniority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
